For my uploaders friend, I would like to tell you that if I'm always available during 21:00-03:00. Other times I might not be available so be sue to turned on your torrent on a daily or constant basis. I would be available on every day on a timely manners.
 The high download speed users are encouraged to download it as my upload capacity is also around 80 kbps. On this speed within 2 hours you can complete this & seed to others.
For dial up users wait a little bit long days, as those users can not fetch data quickly from me.
